title: Bobby's Mailbag + Good Songs For Tough Times + Lunchbox Pranks Calls A Massage Parlor
itunes:title: Bobby's Mailbag + Good Songs For Tough Times + Lunchbox Pranks Calls A Massage Parlor
description:
Bobby reads a message from a listener who found a vape pen in her son's school bag. He offers advice on how to handle the situation. The show members all share songs that helped them through tough times in their lives. Plus, Lunchbox prank calls a massage parlor with a strange request for his Mom!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
